snippet: The assessment, by a British nonprofit research organization, recorded almost 40 incidents involving standoffs between Russian forces and the West in the months after Russia’s annexation of Crimea in March.
abstract: Report by British nonprofit research organization European Leadership Network logs almost 40 episodes in eight months involving Russian forces in 'volatile standoff' with the West; incidents chronicled are all said to have taken place since Russia's annexation of Crimea.
lead_paragraph: The assessment, by a British nonprofit research organization, recorded almost 40 incidents involving standoffs between Russian forces and the West in the months after Russia’s annexation of Crimea in March.

headline.main: Researchers Detail a Spike in NATO-Russia Close Calls
headline.print_headline: Researchers Detail a Spike in NATO-Russia Close Calls
